CustomField.description: Create Agreement with line items, if the proposal is accepted.
CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, "Accepted") , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPComply__ProposalAgreementCreate?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus_QPComply__Button_CreateAgreementWithLineItems", "Create Agreement with Line Items"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Create Agreement With Line Items
